peril.views.slick.util

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.util.Button

  • public final class Button
extends Clickable
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a button on screen. This button can be clicked using click().
    Since:
    2018-02-16
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joseph_Rolli, Joshua_Eddy, Mohammed_Sayed_Ackbar
    See Also:
    Action, Clickable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Action<?> action
      The Action this Button will perform when click() is performed.
      java.lang.String id
      Holds the id of this Button allowing it to be identified.
      private boolean isVisible
      Holds whether this Button should be displayed on screen or not.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Button(Point position, org.newdawn.slick.Image image, Action<?> action, java.lang.String id)
      Constructs a new Button.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void click()
      Performs the Action assigned to this Button.
      Action<?> getAction()
      Retrieves the Action assigned to this Button.
      void hide()
      Sets this Button to hidden.
      boolean isVisible()
      Retrieves whether this Button should be displayed on screen or not.

      Sets this Button to visible.

      • id

        public final java.lang.String id
        Holds the id of this Button allowing it to be identified.

        The Action this Button will perform when click() is performed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button(Point position,
              org.newdawn.slick.Image image,
              Action<?> action,
              java.lang.String id)
        Constructs a new Button.
        Parameters:
        position - The Point position of the Button.
        image - The Image this Button will display on screen.
        action - The Action this button will perform when click() is performed.
        id - The id string that denotes this button.

    • Method Detail

      • click

        public void click()
        Performs the Action assigned to this Button. The Button can only been clicked when it isVisible().

      • getAction

        public Action<?> getAction()
        Retrieves the Action assigned to this Button.
        Returns:
        Action.

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Sets this Button to hidden.

      • show

        public void show()
        Sets this Button to visible.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Retrieves whether this Button should be displayed on screen or not. If this is not visible then click() will do nothing.
        Returns:
        boolean
